Class GlobalAcmeConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cesecore.internal.UpgradeableDataHashMap

        • org.ejbca.config.GlobalAcmeConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, IUpgradeableData
    public class GlobalAcmeConfiguration
extends ConfigurationBase
    Global Configuration object which holds all the AcmeConfigurations and generic protocol settings.
